attacks.name: Water Gun
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each W Energy attached to Misty's Starmie but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.

attacks.name: Bubblebeam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
